thread.title: QVC face ANOTHER embarrassing wardrobe malfunction
thread.title_full: QVC face ANOTHER embarrassing wardrobe malfunction

title: QVC face ANOTHER embarrassing wardrobe malfunction
text: Share this article Share This isn't the first time that a similar wardrobe malfunction has occurred on the shopping channel. In September, a model revealed more than she was hoping to on the show. The model, seemingly unaware of the wardrobe malfunction, continued to twirl around showcasing the garment 'That's one way to get items sold,' said one viewer who spotted the malfunction on YouTube Due to the tightness of the bra, the nude hue and some glaring lighting, little was left to the imagination Donning a tight-fitting grey slip, which aims to give you a flawless figure under your clothes, Hampshire model Sammi Marsh-Wade was not aware that her nipples were clearly visible. Due to the tightness of the dress, little was left to the imagination and eagle-eyed viewers quickly pointed out the wardrobe malfunction online. The video, posted to YouTube , has since been viewed over 280,000 times. In the clip, the two presenters say that bodysuits are making a bit of a comeback - calling the slip 'very Hollywood' and 'glamorous'. The QVC sales segment encouraged viewers to buy the tight grey slip - but it became popular for an entirely different reason. The thin and tight nature of the dress meant that the 26-year-old Sammi's nipples were visible through the material and viewers even unkindly pointed out that her nipples were 'uneven'. The above sales segment on QVC has had over 280,000 views on YouTube Sammi modelled a tight grey slip for the segment However, most viewers were complimentary of the model in the figure-hugging slip. One person wrote: 'Amazing. This blonde knows she is hot'. While another said: 'Best QVC vid I've ever seen.' Another said: 'If they did this for QVC USA they might have an audience.' Viewers called the model, pictured above, 'amazing' One commenter on YouTube called the clip the 'best QVC vid I'd ever seen' Read more:
